domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
Joe Biden says that on “Day 1” he wants to raise your taxes.

What that means: An additional $2,000 in taxes for the average family, and millions would see their child tax credit cut in half.

We can’t afford Biden!
